divs: Sighting DetailsAS A HOMEMAKER I WAS STARTLED TO HEAR THE WARNING FROM MY NEAREST NIKE SITE SCRAMBLING ALL PERSONNEL TO REPORT TO BASE. WE WATCHED THIS DISC FLYING HOOVERING OVER THE BUILDINGS IN DOWNTOWN SEATTLE ON KING TV.MY HUSBAND REPORTED AS ORDERED AND I WATCHED TV KNOWING ALL MISSLES WERE LOADED AND AIMED AT SEATTLE.HOURS WENT BY. JETS FROM NEARBY AIR BASES WERE DEPLOYED AND ATTEMPTING TO SUBDUE IT. THE DISC WHICH WE ALL BELIEVED TO BE A UFO. WE WERE ON HIGH ALERT BUT IT COULDN;T BE CAUGHT. PRETTY SOON TV WAS DEAD AND EVEN THOUGH WE WERE STILL ON RED ALERT WENT ON AND WE DID NOT GET AN ALL CLEAR TILL THE FOLLOWING DAY, AT WHICH TIME ALL MILITARY PERSONNEL AND THEIR FAMILIES WERE TOLD IT WAS NOTHING! WE SAW NOTHING!! IT DIDN;T EVER HAPPEN!!! NOT MANY PEOPLE ON BAINBRIDGE ISLAND OR POULSBO EVEN HAD TELEPHONES AND TV;S WHICH MADE A COVER-UP VERY EASY.
Summary: ufo over downtown seattle, scrambled all military bases to red alert
trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There were no other sightings in Seattle on or around April 21st 1959
